participant_1.background:
I'm a weirdo who loves to swim in the lake.
i am always looking for wildlife when i am outside.
i like to drink chai tea before bed every night.
I live in my parent's basement and work a lot, so I usually don't have time for a healthy diet or exercise.
My daily routine is pretty relaxed as I'm taking a year off before college, but I like to make sure I keep busy and get some reading in on the weekends.

participant_2.background:
I take long rides on my moped and listen to music.
my mother is allergic to dogs.
I always end my day with a cup of chai tea to wind down from the chaos of family life.
I enjoy spending time with my son and training my troops.
I am clumsy, but I make up for it with my cooking skills.

content.text: Hey there! How are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking! How about you?
I'm doing good too, thanks! I'm taking a year off before college and I'm just relaxing and enjoying my free time.
That sounds fun! I'm a little jealous, I'm still in the thick of college and I'm not looking forward to finals next week.
Oh no, good luck with finals! I'm sure you'll do great!
Thanks! I hope so! What are your plans for after college?
I'm not really sure yet, but I'm thinking about majoring in business.
That's a good choice, business is a great field to get into.
Thanks! I'm glad you think so.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to swim, read, and spend time outside.
Oh nice, I like to swim too! I also like to take long rides on my moped and listen to music.
That sounds fun! I've never been on a moped before.
You should try it sometime, it's really fun!
I will! Thanks for the recommendation!
